Header: Police Inspector nabbed for trafficking marijuana
Content: Police arrested a police inspector at Ambilipitiya, while he was trafficking a stock of marijuana in a lorry last night. The arrested police inspector is attached to Wellawaaya Police. When the police inspected the lorry following a tip-off, 2 persons travelling in the lorry have fled the scene. Later police arrested one of them, who turned out to be the police inspector.
